Articles.Content:
It seems that for some reason, you can't just download the demo, you have to send an E-mail first. This might turn people off from trying the game, they might think it could be some scam perhaps, or maybe they just don't want to to through the trouble of sending the email first. What is the reasoning behind this? I'm trying to see if I can put the demo on this computer to demonstrate to some friends, and i ran into this minor thing that might become a problem in the future. It just complicates things.

On the bright side, the Email is sent out really quickly, within a second. So that's neat.
